title: FT: Some raw EPDGs - Taking Offers
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Some raw EPDGs - Taking Offers
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade these EPDGs for ones I need or upgrades to ones I already have. Just shoot me a PM with what you have. The images on these are really nice

RUDOLPH, RUCKER, POWELL ARE SOLD

Key ones I’m looking for:
Bell, George (Follow Thru)
Bowerman, Frank
Fromme, Art
Geyer, Rube
Howell, Harry (Hand At Waist)
Hummel, John
Keeler, Willie (With Bat)
Konetchy, Ed (Glove Near Ground)
Lavender, Jimmy
Leach, Tommy (Portrait)
McGraw, John (Glove At Hip)
Scott, Jim
Smith, Happy
Tinker, Joe (Bat Off)
